video_prompt: An anime-style young woman flies or descends through a futuristic cityscape. Her long, light blue hair flows dynamically with her motion. Her intensely red-glowing eyes maintain a determined expression. Energy propulsion glows from her boots as the vast city continuously passes by. Building lights subtly shift, while thick white light beams dynamically crisscross the sky. Numerous glowing red and pink lines weave and pulse throughout the scene, suggesting energetic data streams.
image_prompt:
Here's a concise prompt suitable for an image generation model:

"Dynamic futuristic anime illustration of a female character suspended mid-air above a vibrant high-tech cityscape. She has long, flowing light blue/silver hair and intense glowing red eyes with a determined expression. She wears a sleek dark suit, white shirt, dark tie, shiny form-fitting dark pants, and dark gloved hands. She holds a futuristic rifle/staff (dark metal, glowing red/blue accents) and has dark high-tech boots with glowing orange/yellow soles. The cityscape features towering skyscrapers with glowing windows (blues, purples, oranges) under a bright blue sky with fluffy white clouds. The scene is filled with crisscrossing brilliant white light beams and weaving glowing red/pink energy lines, alongside prominent dark metallic structures. Vibrant, dramatic lighting."
refined_video_prompt: A figure rapidly flies or descends. Their hair streams dynamically with motion, intensely glowing eyes holding a determined expression. Energy propulsion radiates from their boots. The city continuously scrolls past, its building lights subtly shifting. Thick white light beams dynamically crisscross the sky. Numerous glowing red and pink lines weave and pulse energetically throughout the scene.
